title: Kai'Sa and Hextech Crafting
body:
So I got the Kai'Sa champion shard from my last level up capsule, but it will cost 4680 BE to craft her from a shard, this seems ridiculous.
I thought shards were supposed to mean something?

The difference between this rather than disenchanting the shard to BE, waiting til she drops to 6300 in a week, and buying her then from the store (with BE) is 60 BE.

What a fucking joke hextech crafting has become. The benefits are so negligible that it seizes to be a "rewards" system.

replies.body: The upgrade cost will drop to 3780 when she drops to 6300 BE. DIsenchant for a 6300 champ is 1260, dunno if hers is currently higher.
oh wait, does LAKIGR not realise shards disenchant for BE?

He does... The shard will disenchant for about 2-3,000 BE.
